data.actual_result: The screen isn't scrollable and you cannot see the Wumpus.
data.expected_result: The screen is scrollable and you can scroll down to see the Wumpus.
data.short_description: Switching orientation (to landscape) in the join  sever with invite screen hides the Wumpus.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the bottom of your server list and click on add a server button. - Click on join a server with invite link. - Switch orientation (to landscape).
